actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to deny any deduction for expenses or attending business conventions outside the United States.

summary.text: Eliminates the income tax deduction for expenses of attending business conventions outside the United States. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 274)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to deny any deduction for expenses or attending business conventions outside the United States.
